text: The 2025 Kartalkaya hotel fire happened on January 21, 2025, when a fire started at the Grand Kartal Hotel in the ski area of Kartalkaya in Bolu Province, Turkey. At least 76 people were killed, also 51 others were injured. Turkish President Recep Tayyip ErdoÄŸan made the day of national mourning for January 22. Around 267 emergency units were called to the scene of the fire. == References == Category:Natural disasters Category:2020s disasters in Turkey Category:January 2025 events Category:2020s fires in Asia
title: 2025 Kartalkaya hotel fire
